feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:42 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
